failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:
https://api.unsplash.com/collections
The response we received from your web server was:
> 403: Forbidden
This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: POST URL: https://api.unsplash.com/collections Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "Authorization": "Bearer INux6IxQuZLjnBq9Sg00riAK7CNUNODvts_uA6EpGkY", "accept": "application/json", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/10.6.0 Chrome/102.0.5005.148 Electron/19.0.8 Safari/537.36", "cookie": "_gat=1; _sp_ses.0295=*; _gid=GA1.2.1296606412.1661078477; ugid=362e4df03dfadb940f70063d8ad70d185536928; _ga=GA1.2.378058082.1661078477; _sp_id.0295=86a361c30d74f7fc.1661078477.1.1661078482.1661078477.e4b7e3c2-b5e5-4893-8a9c-bcbcc6416e35", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-type": "application/json", "content-length": 30 } Body: {"title":"Flowers collection"}
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 403 - Forbidden Headers: { "connection": "keep-alive", "server": "Cowboy", "content-type": "application/json", "access-control-allow-origin": "*", "access-control-request-method": "*", "access-control-allow-headers": "*", "access-control-expose-headers": "Link,X-Total,X-Per-Page,X-RateLimit-Limit,X-RateLimit-Remaining", "content-language": "en", "cache-control": "no-cache", "x-ratelimit-limit": "50", "x-ratelimit-remaining": "35", "x-request-id": "fc87a889-5553-4f31-985d-d61b4b7ec74d", "x-runtime": "0.012805", "content-encoding": "gzip", "strict-transport-security": "max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains", "via": "1.1 vegur, 1.1 varnish, 1.1 varnish", "accept-ranges": "bytes", "date": "Sun, 21 Aug 2022 10:41:24 GMT", "x-served-by": "cache-iad-kcgs7200120-IAD, cache-qpg1259-QPG", "x-cache": "MISS, MISS", "x-cache-hits": "0, 0", "x-timer": "S1661078484.805989,VS0,VE259", "vary": "Accept-Encoding, Origin,Authorization,Accept-Language,Accept", "transfer-encoding": "chunked" } Body: { "errors": [ "You need to confirm your email to perform that action" ] }
https://on.cypress.io/request
Because this error occurred during a `before all` hook we are skipping the remaining tests in the current suite: `collection`
